Package j8spec

Core J8Spec classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SafeBlock
    Block of code that is safe to execute, i.e.
    UnsafeBlock
    Block of code that is unsafe to execute, i.e.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Example
    Example ready to be executed.
    ExampleConfiguration
    Represents an example block configuration.
    ExampleConfiguration.Builder
    Example configuration builder.
    ExampleGroupConfiguration
    Represents a example group configuration.
    Exceptions
    J8Spec exceptions.
    J8Spec
    J8Spec main facade.
    Var<T>
    Wrapper object to allow "final" variables to have their value modified.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Exceptions.Base
    J8Spec base exception.
    Exceptions.BlockAlreadyDefined
    Thrown when an example or example group with the same description has already been defined in the same context.
    Exceptions.HardCodedSeedNotAllowedInCIMode
    Thrown when a spec has the seed for the random order hard-coded while the system property j8spec.ci.mode is true.
    Exceptions.IllegalContext
    Thrown when a block definition method is called outside the context of the J8Spec.read(Class) method.
    Exceptions.IllegalSeedProperty
    Thrown when the j8spec.seed property has an invalid value.
    Exceptions.OperationNotAllowedInCIMode
    Thrown when a method that ignores or focuses an example or example group (like xit or fit) is used while the system property j8spec.ci.mode is true.
    Exceptions.SpecInitializationFailed
    Thrown when an instance of the class that contains the spec definition cannot be created.

Package j8spec Description

Core J8Spec classes.
